content: a blizzard is coming but these fluffy snowflakes won t chill you designed for kokopelli design s 2015 christmas ornament cal 1 and an early christmas gift to you the pattern comes in both a hexagon and a square variant use the hexagon to make some fun christmas ornaments in the cal then make the square to add to your next afghan click here to go straight to the hexagon pattern 2 click here to go straight to the square pattern 3 click here to get the designer s recommendation for a 12 inch square 4 ***new blizzard warning afghan square pattern is now available in dutch click here to go directly to the dutch translation 5 *** ***a video tutorial is now included click above on the link the square pattern for the full step by step video *** see my other designs in my ravelry store 6 and on my blog everytrickonthehook com 7 and to stay up to date with new pattern releases follow every trick on the hook on facebook 8 1 http //kokopellidesign blogspot de/2015/10/star-cal-hexagon-patterns-list html 2 http //everytrickonthehook com/2015/11/05/blizzard-warning/ 3 http //everytrickonthehook com/2015/11/05/blizzard-warning-square/ 4 http //everytrickonthehook com/2015/11/08/blizzard-warning-inching-forward/ 5 http //everytrickonthehook com/2016/04/06/blizzard-warning-square-pattern-in-dutch/ 6 http //www ravelry com/designers/polly-plum 7 http //everytrickonthehook com/ 8 https //www facebook com/everytrickonthehook/
